item.description: I will give a brief presentation on localizing an existing iPhone application. The iPhone OS supports 20 different languages, and it's relatively easy to distribute a single application with multiple translations. I'll give a high-level overview of why this is important, and how it is done, then dive a little deeper into the actual process. If all goes well, you'll see my application go from English-only to supporting 13 languages right before your very eyes!
item.how_to_find_us: Large meeting room on lower level
item.name: iPhone development - localizing your iPhone application
